DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective: to evaluate the practicability and acceptability of STYLOMAX速, a new injection device for MAXOMAT速, in children, for 1 year.
DOC.brief_title: Practicability and Acceptability of Stylomax速 in Children
DOC.criteria: Children over 3 years of age with growth hormone deficiency, requiring treatment with MAXOMAT速 according to the criteria of the MA. The above information is not intended to contain all considerations relevant to a patient's potential participation in a clinical trial.
